to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: frotz interpreter
body:
Hiya,
The most important source is the Interactive Fiction Archhive at:
ftp.ifarchive.org
There is also a web interface, which is easy to navigate, at:
www.ifarchive.org
You need to look in the if-archive/games/zcode directory.
Yours,
Zack.

----- Original Message ----- 
From: "Paul Migliorelli (+1 3 0 3 5 5 2 6 9 7 0)"

Subject: ot: frotz interpreter
